title: Pino Donaggio - Trauma Soundtrack (1993) (Dario Argento's Movie
description:
The soundtrack to Dario Argento&#039;s 1993 movie Trauma (AKA Dario Argento&#039;s Trauma).

Trauma, starring Christopher Rydell, Asia Argento, Piper Laurie, Frederic Forrest, Laura Johnson, Dominique Serrand, James Russo, Ira Belgrade and Brad Dourif was Argento&#039;s next movie after Opera and unfortunately his least popular.

Known as his &#039;American movie&#039;, Trauma was shot entirely in Minneapolis, USA and was an Italian-American co-production featuring a largely American cast.

The story concerns Aura Petrescu (Asia Argento), a young anorexic woman whose parents are beheaded by a stranger at the end of a seance held by her mystic Romanian mother (Piper Laurie)...

Deciding to not employ the services of Goblin or Morricone this time &#039;round, Argento chose Pino Donnagio to compose the score.

This reissue contains the previously unreleased 10 minute &#039;Trauma Suite&#039;. 


from: http://www.moviegrooves.com
